playbooks.sprk_description: Comprehensive email analysis combining email metadata, body text, and attachment contents. Generates TL;DR, summary, keywords, entities, and classification for email-to-document automation workflows.

actions.ACT-001: Extract Entities - Named entity extraction (parties, organizations, dates, amounts)
actions.ACT-003: Classify Document - Email type classification (correspondence, notification, request)
actions.ACT-004: Summarize Content - Generate TL;DR and summary from combined email+attachments

tools.TL-001: Entity Extractor - Extract parties, organizations, dates, amounts from email context
tools.TL-003: Document Classifier - Classify email type and purpose
tools.TL-004: Summary Generator - Generate TL;DR and summary from email+attachments

inputFormat.description: Combined text input constructed by EmailAnalysisService

notes: Uses same tools as Document Profile but with email-structured input
EmailAnalysisService prepends email metadata to extracted text
Attachment contents are concatenated with section headers
Output fields updated on both email entity and associated documents
